Steps.Message: Update at 03:56- It's Aaron from the text messaging team and I'm pleased to inform that we believe our engineers have been able to restore power to all customers in the Westgate Road/Essex Road area, by diverting power around the underground network fault. We're sorry it's taken us longer than we expected to restore your power today. Please accept our sincere apologies as we know that it's difficult to be without power for a longer duration, and during the current pandemic this can be especially difficult, but please rest assured that as key workers our staff will continue to work around the clock to keep the lights on. If your power isn't back on, or to talk to us about anything else, call us on 08003163105, free from landlines and mobiles.

We became aware of a power cut at 19:51. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
